name: che-things-mcp
description: Native AppleScript integration for Things 3 task management app
long_description: A Swift-based MCP server providing 37 tools for managing Things 3 tasks, projects, areas, and tags. Features include inbox, today, upcoming, anytime, someday, and logbook access, full CRUD operations for todos and projects, batch operations for efficient bulk processing, checklist item management with auth token support, move operations, UI controls, and advanced queries. Uses native AppleScript for reliable integration. Requires macOS 13.0 or later and Things 3 installed.
